description: The popularity of rummy as an online strategic card game has grown exponentially in recent years. In India, online rummy is quickly becoming a go-to for players looking to enjoy a quick card game.
Just like any other card game, there are several types/variations of rummy. From Gin Rummy to Oklahoma Rummy to 500 Rummy, many rummy variations are played across the globe.

Amongst rummy types popular in India, the 13 Card Rummy, which is also known as the ‘Indian Rummy’, seems to be the most preferred. As the name suggests, each player is handed 13 cards to start the game. In rummy, the primary objective is to be the first on the table to form the combinations and make a valid declaration. In 13 Card Rummy, the objective is to make minimum 2 sequences, out of which one needs to be a pure sequence. The rest can be any valid sequence or sets.
The popularity of rummy as an online strategic card game has grown exponentially in recent years. In India, online rummy is quickly becoming a go-to for players looking to enjoy a quick card game.

data.header: Different Types of Rummy Games on vpl

description: The types of rummy games available on vpl is basically an extension of the 13-Card Rummy, i.e. Points Rummy, Deals Rummy and Pool Rummy.

Points Rummy is amongst the most played variants of rummy games in India. The maximum point-tally for a losing player is capped at 80 points. Points Rummy is generally recommended for beginners and for players looking to enjoy a quick session of a game or two. It is a rummy variation where players play for points with a pre-decided rupee value. The player to make the first valid declaration wins the game and takes home the cash based on the total points accumulated by the opponent.
Points Rummy is amongst the most played variants of rummy games in India. The maximum point-tally for a losing player is capped at 80 points.

It is always better to form the pure sequence right at the beginning. Since having a pure sequence in the hand is mandatory, the earlier the pure sequence is formed, the easier it becomes to form the other combinations.Joker is an important card to have in a game of rummy. The printed joker or a wild card joker comes handy to make an impure sequence or a set.
Joker is an important card to have in a game of rummy. The printed joker or a wild card joker comes handy to make an impure sequence or a set.

It is always better to form the pure sequence right at the beginning. Since having a pure sequence in the hand is mandatory, the earlier the pure sequence is formed, the easier it becomes to form the other combinations.

Deals Rummy is essentially a game of Points Rummy that is played for a fixed number of deals or rounds. Amongst the different types of rummy, this is a rummy variation where every player gets an equal number of scores at the start of every deal. When the pre-determined deals are over, the player with the maximum scores is declared as the winner. In deals rummy, players pay a fixed entry fee to join the table. The entry fee of all players is used to form the prize pool.

Deals Rummy is essentially a game of Points Rummy that is played for a fixed number of deals or rounds. Amongst the different types of rummy, this is a rummy variation where every player gets an equal number of scores at the start of every deal.

The strategies mentioned under Points Rummy are very much applicable for Deals Rummy as well as for Pool Rummy, as it lays the perfect foundation for winning a game. In order to make a valid declaration, a player has to create two sequences, one of which must be a pure sequence. When it comes to two decks, a card of the same value must not be used for creating a set, otherwise it will be considered an invalid declaration.
The strategies mentioned under Points Rummy are very much applicable for Deals Rummy as well as for Pool Rummy, as it lays the perfect foundation for winning a game.

Similar to Deals Rummy, players in a table pool-in money to start the game, which forms the prize pool. Much like other different types of Rummy, Pools Rummy is also played over a number of rounds. However, in this rummy variation, the game is played with a pre-decided points tally. The player to reach the points tally gets eliminated. This continues until only one player is left on the table, who is declared as the winner. It is popularly played in two versions - 101 and 201 Pool Rummy.
Similar to Deals Rummy, players in a table pool-in money to start the game, which forms the prize pool. Much like other different types of Rummy, Pools Rummy is also played over a number of rounds.

Scoring the least possible points at the end of every game is the key to avoid elimination. Strategic discarding of cards is important in Pool Rummy. It is advisable to lose the high value cards like K, Q, A and J. This helps to lower the overall score in case the player fails to win the round.

Apart from the variations in rummy, interested players can also participate in various online rummy leaderboards available on the vpl app. Players are pitted against multiple players for intense competitive online rummy games with those having better skills usually winning the game.

Playing rummy online on vpl is easily one of the most popular ways to engage in a friendly competition. The soaring popularity of rummy coupled with the ease of accessibility makes vpl the leading choice for players looking to hone their skills in the card game or for players looking to test their mettle in a competitive battle. The rummy points system on vpl rewards the best after all. Click here to know some interesting tips to win rummy online on vpl.
